is.merkor.core.redis.dictionaries
Class RedisClusterDictionary

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.redis.dictionaries.RedisClusterDictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClusterDictionary
public class RedisClusterDictionary
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterDictionary

An implementation of the ClusterDictionary interface using a Redis representation of the MerkOr data.

Version:
0.8
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir

Method Detail

getClustersMatching

public java.util.List<? extends Cluster> getClustersMatching(java.lang.String domainRegex)
Description copied from interface: ClusterDictionary
Retrieves all Clusters having names matching domainRegex. Implementing classes should define which kind of regular expressions are allowed. If no wildcards are used, the method retrieves Clusters with the exact domain name domainRegex. The matching should not be case sensitive.

Specified by:
getClustersMatching in interface ClusterDictionary
Parameters:
domainRegex - a plain String or a regular expression to match against domain names
Returns:
a List of Clusters matching domainRegex, or an empty List if nothing is found.

getClusterById

public Cluster getClusterById(java.lang.Long id)
Description copied from interface: ClusterDictionary
Returns the Cluster with the unique id.

Specified by:
getClusterById in interface ClusterDictionary
Parameters:
id - the id of a Cluster
Returns:
a Cluster, returns null if a Cluster with id does not exist.
